name: PDXBusTracker
0:
”Alexa, Launch P. D. X. Bus Tracker.”
”Alexa, Ask P. D. X. Bus Tracker for two two six six.”
”Alexa, Ask P. D. X. Bus Tracker for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. d. x. bus tracker
des: PDX Bus Tracker tells you arrivals for all buses for a given Stop ID. Invoke by calling Open PDX Bus Tracker, provide the Stop ID and it will respond with all Buses, Scheduled times and Next arrival times. Disclaimer; the app may not be suitable for all ages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
